about_the_game:
Subdue world leaders. Become the new world hegemon: change the international balance of power, wage massive wars, break up NATO and the Warsaw Pact. This addition will make the foreign policy process more interesting, including:

- Plenty of new wars with different interesting outcomes that rewrite the world map
- An active and elaborated political history of Western Europe
- "Final Solution to the North American Hegemony".
- More than 150 new events and endings

Now in your hands to let the Celestial Mandate reign again over the entire world!
detailed_description:
Subdue world leaders. Become the new world hegemon: change the international balance of power, wage massive wars, break up NATO and the Warsaw Pact. This addition will make the foreign policy process more interesting, including:

- Plenty of new wars with different interesting outcomes that rewrite the world map
- An active and elaborated political history of Western Europe
- "Final Solution to the North American Hegemony".
- More than 150 new events and endings

Now in your hands to let the Celestial Mandate reign again over the entire world!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.12+
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (32-bit, 64-bit)
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, Windows 8, 8.1, Windows 10, etc (32-bit, 64-bit)
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10 (shader model 4.0)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
